tool_description: This API queries  My Hero Academia Characters names, avatars etc.
title: My Hero Academia Characters

api_list.name: Get All My Hero Academia Characters
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all my hero academic characters from my hero academia series.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://my-hero-academia-characters.p.rapidapi.com/c"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "my-hero-academia-characters.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
